item.title: Be Careful When Choosing House
item.description: Be Careful When Choosing a Place to Stay in Singapore When you come to Singapore, be careful when choosing a place to stay. What is a poor person’s house? I refer to those who rent out a room in their own residence. These landlords usually have significant financial pressures. On the one hand, they bought an HDB flat but need to rent out a room to help with their mortgage payments; on the other hand, they may be very picky about tenants, leading to conflicts and an atmosphere that feels more like a student dormitory than a home.
